answers.answer: A friend of mine did they kept her baby girl for a week but she's home now and they both are doing great this was very recently like two weeks ago and she was 36 weeks when she had her
I am being tested for that because they think I have it but I'm only 22 weeks..
I had it with my first, I was 38 weeks exact so I was induced and everything was fine. I'm 19 weeks and not showing any signs yet but they are watching closely.

I had preeclampsia my baby was born at 27wks and 6days she weight 1lb 1oz and was 11inches long. I got the sterriods shot and put on magnesium for her brain. She was born 9.10.14. Shes been in the NICU every since and she is doing absolutely fine. Shes a fiesty lil thing always trying to fight her nurses lol. Shes on a ventilator whch is there to help her breathe but she breathes over the machine so its only in place just incase she needs it and they ddnt want to pull it to soon then have to reinsert it. I must say she is little and its my 1st baby so im scared to touch her. But she started picking up her weight now.
I honestly hope & pray I do not get preeclampsia with this baby :/ ugh! I had it with my daughter , & it's terrible!
I am waiting on the results of my test I am 25 weeks Tuesday
What are the symptoms of preeclampsia?
The only signs i think i had was high blood pressures. But the doctor said that my placenta wasnt allowing her to grow so that may be a sign but i dont know

I was diagnosed at 27 weeks with preeclampsia. I had high blood pressure and protein in my urine. I'm now 34 weeks and 3 days and I'm getting induced at 37 weeks. Some signs are bad headaches that don't go away with Tylenol. Major swelling in hands,feet and face. A dull pain in the top right of your stomach and seeing "stars"(blurry vision).. I haven't had any symptoms luckily besides the couple high blood pressures and protein in my urine but I get monitored twice a week and have a drs appointment once a week. Preeclampsia can be scary, that's why they monitor so closely but it can also be kept under control. I also take baby aspirin once a day.

question: Any mom's diagnosed with preeclampsia? I'm 28 Weeks today and I got the steroid shots to mature the baby's lungs, in case of early delivery. Anyone else have any positive experience?
title: preeclampsia
